profile:
When property damage occurs, PuroClean Brantford is driven to provide an unmatched service experience that is quick, professional and ethical.
As a leader in property emergency services, we specialize in water damage, specifically water damage remediation, as well as mould removal, and mould remediation.
Our main concern is meeting the needs of the customer and eliminating the problem in the most efficient manner possible.
We serve the Brantford area.

Website: http://www.puroclean.ca/brantford/
Business Email: jreis@puroclean.ca
Business Hours: 24/7
No. of Employees: 10 to 15
Year Established: 2012
No. of Branches: 1

profile: 'Home Restorations Brantford has been providing Brantford residents with professional and friendly service. We quickly resolve water damage caused from flooding, sewer back-ups, fire, smoke and mould damage. Our emergency response team is the best in the area, with an always-ready mentality that makes them great responders to stressful events such as flooding, sewage spills, fires and more. They work efficiently with you as a business or homeowner to remedy the effects of virtually any emergency. Our goal is to protect and restore your property while preventing damage to the rest of your home.'
name: Home Restorations Brantford
